name: ItalianMomAdvice

skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: italian mom advice
des:
If you talk to an Italian son, he will tell you that italian moms are "advice machines". 

"how can you say you don't like it, if you don't taste it ?"
"change your underpants, that if you have an accident..."

are only two of many advices that you can hear now, also if you never encountereed an Italian Mom !!

For advices, requests or recommendations you can write to us at StudioSoft Informatica using the email alexa@studiosoft.eu.
